item.title: Java how to organize gui?
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

Hi i made a JFRAME code with panels and i need help organize the panels on the screen
ill show you the code i made (The frame) :

[code]
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
public class Frame {
public static void main(String args[]){

frame1 frame2 = new frame1();

frame2 .setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
frame2 .setSize(275, 180);
frame2 .setVisible(true);
}

}[/code]
now Frame1 code :

[code]
import java.awt.FlowLayout;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
public class frame1 extends JFrame{
private JLabel HealthLevel;
private JLabel HealthL;
private int Level1 = 5;
private int Health = 10;
public frame1(){
super(“The Title”);
setLayout(new FlowLayout());
HealthLevel = new JLabel(“PlayerLevel: “+Level1+”/99”);
HealthL = new JLabel(“PlayerHealth: “+Health+”/99”);
add(HealthL);
add(HealthLevel);
}

}[/code]
[size=18pt]I know this is basic code but I need help with organize the panels on the screen[/size]

Read full topic
